responses.rationale: The segment uses neutral language ('blamed on', 'contaminate') to describe the spread, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment states a fact about confirmed cases using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment reports a confirmed case and bird count using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment reports case locations using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment uses neutral verbs ('infected', 'forcing the killing') and states numbers factually, lacking high-potency framing.
The segment reports the number of birds killed using neutral language ('had to kill'), lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment reports numbers and consequences using neutral language ('having to kill'), lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment provides factual context about Iowa's production using neutral language, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
